body.name: AUSDOM Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard Full Size, Quiet Slim Multi-Device Rechargeable Cordless QWERTY Keyboard with Number Pad, Low Profile Silent Flat Universal Keyboard for Computer/Mac/Windows
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 43 mins
features: Multi-Device Connection: Easily connect up to 3 devices and seamlessly switch among them via Bluetooth 5.0 or 2.4Ghz USB receiver. This provides a strong and stable connection between the wireless keyboard and your laptop/computer

Comfortable Typing: Highly responsive scissor-switch structure in this silent wireless keyboard ensures a precise, comfortable and quiet typing experience. Low-profile keys increase the stability of the buttons and reduce tapping noise. Fashionable appearance and soft touch design bring you efficient office experience

Ultra-Slim& Full Size Keyboard: The full size Bluetooth keyboard offers 15 shortcut keys and a numeric keypad that allows your work, especially the data entry, more efficient. The thin, lightweight Bluetooth keyboard is easy to carry, so you can handle your work anywhere

Rechargeable Battery& Energy Saving: Built-in rechargeable lithium battery ensures long-term use of the keyboard. One full charge offers more than 1-month usage time. After 30 minutes inactivity, the bluetooth keyboard will go to sleep mode to save unnecessary energy usage

Wide Compatibility: This wireless keyboard is compatible with Windows, Mac, IOS, Android and other operating systems. Works well with desktop, Chromebook, Macbook, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. Please contact us, if you encounter any problems during use, we provide one year warranty service

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AUSDOM Sofkeys4 Ultra Slim Full Size Wireless Keyboard- Simplify Your Work Time Scissor Switch Design- Thinner, Quieter and More Stable Typing Experience

Main Functions: Quiet and Noiseless Scissor-switch design in this silent wireless keyboard ensures a precise and quiet typing experience. Low-profile keys reduce tapping noise. Bluetooth 5.0& 2.4Ghz Wireless Technology Bluetooth 5.0 provides stable and fast data transmission. With 2.4Ghz wireless technology, you can simply plug the USB dongle into a computer without Bluetooth function and start typing, no software or drivers required. Rechargeable Battery Built-in rechargeable lithium battery ensures long-term use of the keyboard. One full charge offers more than 1-month usage time. The charging time is less than 1.5 hours.

Auto-Sleep Mode After 30 minutes inactivity, the bluetooth keyboard will automatically go to sleep mode to save unnecessary energy usage. Wide Compatibility Compatible with Windows 8,10 or higher, Mac OS×10.10 or higher, Android 4.3 or higher and other 2.4Ghz compatible system. Ultra Slim Design 16.73*4.49*0.50 inches, thin sleek design with an 8 degree typing angle ensures a comfortable typing experience.
Wide Range of Usage Scenarios-Work Efficiently Anytime, Anywhere

Multi-Device Connection-Keep Your Desk Surface Simple and Clean FAQ Q1: Are the function keys (F1-F12) directly accessible? When the function keys cannot be used directly, please find the “Fn” key and the key with a lock symbol next to F12 on the keyboard. Press and hold the “Fn” key and then press the key next to F12 so that you can use the shortcut keys. Q2: Can AUSDOM Wireless keyboard be used as a wired keyboard with usb cable connected? Inside the package there is a USB-C cable and the cable is for charging only. Q3: Can the battery be replaced when the keyboard stops working? AUSDOM Sofkeys4 ultra slim keyboard is equipped with a built in battery and it is rechargeable via a USB-C charging cable(included in the package), so the keyboard doesn’t accept external batteries. Q4: How many devices can be connected to the keyboard at the same time and how to connect? AUSDOM silent Keyboard can be connected to three devices at the same time. Please Turn on the keyboard(the power switch is on the top left of the back of the keyboard) and follow the steps: 1. Plug the USB Receiver into the computer and press the 2.4G mode button to connect the first device.(The USB Receiver is on the back of the keyboard) 2. Press the BT1 button for 3s to enter Bluetooth pairing mode, then operate on a Bluetooth-enabled device to connect the second device. 3. Press the BT2 button for 3s to enter Bluetooth pairing mode, then operate on a Bluetooth-enabled device to connect the third device. Each time the keyboard restarts after auto-sleep, it will automatically connect to the last connected device instead of pairing again. Q5: Is the keyboard compatible with any system or device? The wireless keyboard is not compatible with Windows 7 and Windows XP system in Bluetooth mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is great! I work on both windows and iOS and this keyboard works seamlessly with both which was a huge priority. The keyboard is compact, but has everything you need. The keys were loud at first, but have softened some with us. Battery life is awesome. My only complaints are that there isn't a storage place for the USB connecter for bluetooth and the tilt of the keyboard is not adjustable. Small things, but still a great keyboard for an unbeatable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bluetooth keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I am looking for a lightweight keyboard to put in my office. This one is exactly I am looking for: Bluetooth, lightweight, chargeable. It is so thin and keys function well. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well-engineered
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this keyboard because I wanted something more like a laptop keyboard, with the super-flat keys and heftier feel. This keyboard delivers all that--it's a beautiful piece of equipment. It's solid, beautifully engineered and feels well made. The typing action is easy and crisp. That being said, I did have a few issues.I have a brand-new laptop--all software new, everything updated. I wanted to be able to pair the keyboard through the 2.4G link. Nothing I did seemed to connect. At some point, it did start to work, but the performance was so terrible it was unusable--there were more sticking/repeating and dropped letters than correct ones. Troubleshooting sent me back to square one--it simply would not connect through 2.4G. I even tried seeing if the keyboard was visible in the wireless device list--nope. I was beyond disappointed that this amazing, near-perfect keyboard turned out to be utterly useless. Out of desperation, I tried one of the BT connections. It popped right up and asked if I wanted to connect, and I was off and running. The keyboard was as wonderful to use as I hoped it would be. I still wanted to get it working properly through 2.4G though. I kept trying, and still nothing. Not even the weird results I had the one time.Other than the simple troubleshooting through Amazon, I found no option for much in the way of contact or support on the Ausdom website. I used the the "Ask the seller a question" option and gave a detailed description of the problem and asked for help. It's been the better part of a week and I've heard nothing.I love the keyboard, and will continue to use it with the BT connection. I would have given it 5 stars, but due to the continuing issue with the 2.4G pairing and the lack of any seller response, I only gave it 4. I still hope to hear from the seller and get it working properly. If anything changes, I'll edit my rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hi, just received this keyboard. There's something great about nice low profile keys, they allow user to type so much faster. This Ausdom keyboard is slick, high quality, worth the price. It doesn't slide as I type, looks so nice on my desk, not big and bulky. It's the perfect size, super easy to set up. I knew it was going to be a nice product when I saw the packaging. It comes in an impressive box with silver foil embossed logo printed on top a nice opaque sleeve when you open the box. You know that a company cares when they put money and thought behind their packaging. I hope you enjoy the photos. some of them are blurry, because I took them quickly, anxious to write my review. I never thought I could buy a keyboard online without trying it first, but this proves that you can do. It has the quality and feel of a product that will last a long time. I use it with my laptop, because I like to have my laptop on a second level on my desk, so I'm not tipping my head down all the time. I hope all my photos showed the quality. Thanks Ausdom for a great product! I'm a first time buyer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Connectivity and battery life is horrible! WONT WORK FOR 1 DAY STRAIGHT
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and was looking for a wireless Quiet keyboard. Now I like the super slim design and it is kind of quiet. NOT silent but it's not advertised as silent. BUT the reason Im returning it is because the poor connectivity AND the BATTERY LIFE IS HORRID! I wanted Bluetooth because I wanted fewer wires all over my desk but I was not able to make it through ONE WORKDAY without having to plug it in to charge. Now I dont know 100% if it was the battery or the connection that would cause this but IT was terribly frustrating. I could of kept my money and my old keyboard because no difference when I have to keep it wired connected the whole time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice construction, works well, great 'key feel'. I will buy another when I need one...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power button stuck
reviews.reviewText: I was okay with it as a replacement for my laptop keyboard while working at home, and it seemed to be working okay. I was annoyed a little with its sometiumes difficulty connecting with the laptop bluetooth but if you were patient for a little while it would eventually get connected. Battery life seems fine and it certainly is lightweight. My only disappointments were minor such as it tends to warp so that while typing it clackity-clacks if it's not flat. But it's overall a pretty good value for the money. Unfortunately, I came home today to find that the power button would not operate - it is stuck in the off position and will not power up. Now it's a useless hunk of plastic and springs. My return window closed a month ago. Alas. I will contact the manufacturer and see if they will voluntarily send me a replacement.UPDATE: THE SELLER OFFERED TO SEND ME A NEW ONE OR TO REFUND, MY OPTION. EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE VERY RESPONSIVE. Upgrading from three stars to five.
